Templates.template:
new sap.ui.table.AnalyticalColumn(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		tooltip: ${tooltip}, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase
		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData
		dependents: [${dependents}], // sap.ui.core.Element[]
		width: ${width}, // sap.ui.core.CSSSize
		minWidth: ${0}, // int
		flexible: ${bFlexible}, // boolean
		resizable: ${bResizable}, // boolean
		hAlign: ${sap.ui.core.HorizontalAlign.Begin}, // sap.ui.core.HorizontalAlign
		sorted: ${bSorted}, // boolean
		sortOrder: ${sap.ui.table.SortOrder.Ascending}, // sap.ui.table.SortOrder
		sortProperty: "${sortProperty}", // string
		filtered: ${bFiltered}, // boolean
		filterProperty: "${filterProperty}", // string
		filterValue: "${filterValue}", // string
		filterOperator: "${filterOperator}", // string
		defaultFilterOperator: "${defaultFilterOperator}", // string
		filterType: ${filterType}, // any
		grouped: ${bGrouped}, // boolean
		visible: ${bVisible}, // boolean
		name: "${name}", // string
		showFilterMenuEntry: ${bShowFilterMenuEntry}, // boolean
		showSortMenuEntry: ${bShowSortMenuEntry}, // boolean
		headerSpan: ${1}, // any
		autoResizable: ${bAutoResizable}, // boolean
		label: ${label}, // sap.ui.core.Control
		multiLabels: [${multiLabels}], // sap.ui.core.Control[]
		template: ${template}, // sap.ui.core.Control
		menu: ${menu}, // sap.ui.unified.Menu
		columnMenuOpen: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		leadingProperty: "${leadingProperty}", // string
		summed: ${bSummed}, // boolean
		inResult: ${bInResult}, // boolean
		showIfGrouped: ${bShowIfGrouped}, // boolean
		groupHeaderFormatter: ${groupHeaderFormatter} // any
	}
)
Templates.helpDescription: Experimental!
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.AnalyticalColumn
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new AnalyticalColumn. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getLeadingProperty leadingProperty} : string
    • {@link #getSummed summed} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getInResult inResult} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getShowIfGrouped showIfGrouped} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getGroupHeaderFormatter groupHeaderFormatter} : any
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.table.Column#constructor sap.ui.table.Column} can be used as well.

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.table.AnalyticalColumnMenu(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		tooltip: ${tooltip}, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase
		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData
		dependents: [${dependents}], // sap.ui.core.Element[]
		busy: ${bBusy}, // boolean
		busyIndicatorDelay: ${1000}, // int
		busyIndicatorSize: ${sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize.Medium}, // sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize
		visible: ${bVisible}, // boolean
		fieldGroupIds: ${[]}, // string[]
		validateFieldGroup: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		enabled: ${bEnabled}, // boolean
		ariaDescription: "${ariaDescription}", // string
		maxVisibleItems: ${0}, // int
		pageSize: ${5}, // int
		items: [${items}], // sap.ui.unified.MenuItemBase[]
		ariaLabelledBy: [${ariaLabelledBy}], // (sap.ui.core.Control|string)[]
		itemSelect: [function (oEvent) {}, this] // function|array
	}
)
Templates.helpDescription: Experimental!
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.AnalyticalColumnMenu

new sap.ui.table.AnalyticalTable(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array

		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		tooltip: ${tooltip}, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase
		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData
		dependents: [${dependents}], // sap.ui.core.Element[]
		busy: ${bBusy}, // boolean
		busyIndicatorDelay: ${1000}, // int
		busyIndicatorSize: ${sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize.Medium}, // sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize
		visible: ${bVisible}, // boolean
		fieldGroupIds: ${[]}, // string[]
		validateFieldGroup: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		width: ${"auto"}, // sap.ui.core.CSSSize
		rowHeight: ${rowHeight}, // int
		columnHeaderHeight: ${columnHeaderHeight}, // int
		columnHeaderVisible: ${bColumnHeaderVisible}, // boolean
		visibleRowCount: ${10}, // int
		firstVisibleRow: ${0}, // int
		selectionMode: ${sap.ui.table.SelectionMode.MultiToggle}, // sap.ui.table.SelectionMode
		selectionBehavior: ${sap.ui.table.SelectionBehavior.RowSelector}, // sap.ui.table.SelectionBehavior
		selectedIndex: ${-1}, // int
		editable: ${bEditable}, // boolean
		navigationMode: ${sap.ui.table.NavigationMode.Scrollbar}, // sap.ui.table.NavigationMode
		threshold: ${100}, // int
		enableColumnReordering: ${bEnableColumnReordering}, // boolean
		enableGrouping: ${bEnableGrouping}, // boolean
		showColumnVisibilityMenu: ${bShowColumnVisibilityMenu}, // boolean
		showNoData: ${bShowNoData}, // boolean
		visibleRowCountMode: ${sap.ui.table.VisibleRowCountMode.Fixed}, // sap.ui.table.VisibleRowCountMode
		minAutoRowCount: ${5}, // int
		fixedColumnCount: ${0}, // int
		fixedRowCount: ${0}, // int
		fixedBottomRowCount: ${0}, // int
		enableColumnFreeze: ${bEnableColumnFreeze}, // boolean
		enableCellFilter: ${bEnableCellFilter}, // boolean
		showOverlay: ${bShowOverlay}, // boolean
		enableSelectAll: ${bEnableSelectAll}, // boolean
		enableCustomFilter: ${bEnableCustomFilter}, // boolean
		enableBusyIndicator: ${bEnableBusyIndicator}, // boolean
		rowActionCount: ${0}, // int
		alternateRowColors: ${bAlternateRowColors}, // boolean
		title: ${title}, // sap.ui.core.Control
		footer: ${footer}, // sap.ui.core.Control
		toolbar: ${toolbar}, // sap.ui.core.Toolbar
		extension: [${extension}], // sap.ui.core.Control[]
		columns: [${columns}], // sap.ui.table.Column[]
		rows: [${rows}], // sap.ui.table.Row[]
		noData: ${noData}, // sap.ui.core.Control
		rowActionTemplate: ${rowActionTemplate}, // sap.ui.table.RowAction
		rowSettingsTemplate: ${rowSettingsTemplate}, // sap.ui.table.RowSettings
		dragDropConfig: [${dragDropConfig}], // sap.ui.core.dnd.DragDropBase[]
		contextMenu: ${contextMenu}, // sap.ui.core.IContextMenu
		groupBy: ${groupBy}, // (sap.ui.table.Column|string)
		ariaLabelledBy: [${ariaLabelledBy}], // (sap.ui.core.Control|string)[]
		rowSelectionChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		columnSelect: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		columnResize: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		columnMove: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		sort: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		filter: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		group: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		columnVisibility: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		cellClick: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		cellContextmenu: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		beforeOpenContextMenu: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		columnFreeze: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		customFilter: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		firstVisibleRowChanged: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		busyStateChanged: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		sumOnTop: ${bSumOnTop}, // boolean
		numberOfExpandedLevels: ${0}, // int
		autoExpandMode: ${"Bundled"}, // string
		columnVisibilityMenuSorter: ${columnVisibilityMenuSorter}, // any
		collapseRecursive: ${bCollapseRecursive}, // boolean
		dirty: ${bDirty} // boolean
	}
)
Templates.helpDescription: Table which handles analytical OData backends. The AnalyticalTable only works with an AnalyticalBinding and correctly annotated OData services. Please check on the SAP Annotations for OData Version 2.0 documentation for further details.
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.AnalyticalTable
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new AnalyticalTable. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getSumOnTop sumOnTop} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getNumberOfExpandedLevels numberOfExpandedLevels} : int (default: 0)
    • {@link #getAutoExpandMode autoExpandMode} : string (default: Bundled)
    • {@link #getColumnVisibilityMenuSorter columnVisibilityMenuSorter} : any
    • {@link #getCollapseRecursive collapseRecursive} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getDirty dirty} : boolean
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.table.Table#constructor sap.ui.table.Table} can be used as well.

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.table.Column(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		tooltip: ${tooltip}, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase
		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData
		dependents: [${dependents}], // sap.ui.core.Element[]
		width: ${width}, // sap.ui.core.CSSSize
		minWidth: ${0}, // int
		flexible: ${bFlexible}, // boolean
		resizable: ${bResizable}, // boolean
		hAlign: ${sap.ui.core.HorizontalAlign.Begin}, // sap.ui.core.HorizontalAlign
		sorted: ${bSorted}, // boolean
		sortOrder: ${sap.ui.table.SortOrder.Ascending}, // sap.ui.table.SortOrder
		sortProperty: "${sortProperty}", // string
		filtered: ${bFiltered}, // boolean
		filterProperty: "${filterProperty}", // string
		filterValue: "${filterValue}", // string
		filterOperator: "${filterOperator}", // string
		defaultFilterOperator: "${defaultFilterOperator}", // string
		filterType: ${filterType}, // any
		grouped: ${bGrouped}, // boolean
		visible: ${bVisible}, // boolean
		name: "${name}", // string
		showFilterMenuEntry: ${bShowFilterMenuEntry}, // boolean
		showSortMenuEntry: ${bShowSortMenuEntry}, // boolean
		headerSpan: ${1}, // any
		autoResizable: ${bAutoResizable}, // boolean
		label: ${label}, // sap.ui.core.Control
		multiLabels: [${multiLabels}], // sap.ui.core.Control[]
		template: ${template}, // sap.ui.core.Control
		menu: ${menu}, // sap.ui.unified.Menu
		columnMenuOpen: [function (oEvent) {}, this] // function|array
	}
)
Templates.helpDescription: The column allows you to define column specific properties that will be applied when rendering the table.
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.Column
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new Column. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getWidth width} : sap.ui.core.CSSSize
    • {@link #getMinWidth minWidth} : int (default: 0)
    • {@link #getFlexible flexible} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getResizable resizable} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getHAlign hAlign} : sap.ui.core.HorizontalAlign (default: Begin)
    • {@link #getSorted sorted} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getSortOrder sortOrder} : sap.ui.table.SortOrder (default: Ascending)
    • {@link #getSortProperty sortProperty} : string
    • {@link #getFiltered filtered} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getFilterProperty filterProperty} : string
    • {@link #getFilterValue filterValue} : string
    • {@link #getFilterOperator filterOperator} : string
    • {@link #getDefaultFilterOperator defaultFilterOperator} : string
    • {@link #getFilterType filterType} : any
    • {@link #getGrouped grouped} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getVisible visible} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getName name} : string
    • {@link #getShowFilterMenuEntry showFilterMenuEntry} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShowSortMenuEntry showSortMenuEntry} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getHeaderSpan headerSpan} : any (default: 1)
    • {@link #getAutoResizable autoResizable} : boolean (default: false)
  • Aggregations
    • {@link #getLabel label} : sap.ui.core.Control|string (default)
    • {@link #getMultiLabels multiLabels} : sap.ui.core.Control[]
    • {@link #getTemplate template} : sap.ui.core.Control|string
    • {@link #getMenu menu} : sap.ui.unified.Menu
  • Events
    • {@link #event:columnMenuOpen columnMenuOpen} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Element#constructor sap.ui.core.Element} can be used as well.

Templates.helpDescription: Fires event {@link #event:columnMenuOpen columnMenuOpen} to attached listeners. Listeners may prevent the default action of this event by using the preventDefault-method on the event object.
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.Column.fireColumnMenuOpen

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.table.ColumnMenu(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		tooltip: ${tooltip}, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase
		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData
		dependents: [${dependents}], // sap.ui.core.Element[]
		busy: ${bBusy}, // boolean
		busyIndicatorDelay: ${1000}, // int
		busyIndicatorSize: ${sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize.Medium}, // sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize
		visible: ${bVisible}, // boolean
		fieldGroupIds: ${[]}, // string[]
		validateFieldGroup: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		enabled: ${bEnabled}, // boolean
		ariaDescription: "${ariaDescription}", // string
		maxVisibleItems: ${0}, // int
		pageSize: ${5}, // int
		items: [${items}], // sap.ui.unified.MenuItemBase[]
		ariaLabelledBy: [${ariaLabelledBy}], // (sap.ui.core.Control|string)[]
		itemSelect: [function (oEvent) {}, this] // function|array
	}
)
Templates.helpDescription: The column menu provides all common actions that can be performed on a column.
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.ColumnMenu
Templates.constructorDescription: Constructor for a new ColumnMenu. Note: Applications must not use or change the default sap.ui.table.ColumnMenu of a column in any way or create own instances of sap.ui.table.ColumnMenu. To add a custom menu to a column, use the aggregation menu with a new instance of sap.ui.unified.Menu.

	}
)
Templates.helpDescription: The row.
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.Row
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new Row. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Aggregations
    • {@link #getCells cells} : sap.ui.core.Control[] (default)
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Element#constructor sap.ui.core.Element} can be used as well.

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.table.RowAction(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object

	}
)
Templates.helpDescription: The RowAction control allows to display multiple action items which can be selected by the user. If more action items are available as the available space allows to display an overflow mechanism is provided. This control must only be used in the context of the sap.ui.table.Table control to define row actions.
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.RowAction
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new RowAction. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getVisible visible} : boolean (default: true)
  • Aggregations
    • {@link #getItems items} : sap.ui.table.RowActionItem[] (default)
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Control#constructor sap.ui.core.Control} can be used as well.

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.table.RowActionItem(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID

		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		tooltip: ${tooltip}, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase
		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData
		dependents: [${dependents}], // sap.ui.core.Element[]
		icon: ${icon}, // sap.ui.core.URI

		type: ${sap.ui.table.RowActionType.Custom}, // sap.ui.table.RowActionType
		press: [function (oEvent) {}, this] // function|array
	}
)
Templates.helpDescription: An action items to be displayed in a RowAction control. This element must only be used in the context of the sap.ui.table.Table control to define row actions.
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.RowActionItem
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new RowActionItem. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getIcon icon} : sap.ui.core.URI
    • {@link #getVisible visible} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getText text} : string (default: )
    • {@link #getType type} : sap.ui.table.RowActionType (default: Custom)
  • Events
    • {@link #event:press press} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Element#constructor sap.ui.core.Element} can be used as well.

	}
)
Templates.helpDescription: The RowSettings control allows you to configure a row. You can only use this control in the context of the sap.ui.table.Table control to define row settings.
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.RowSettings
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for new RowSettings. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getHighlight highlight} : sap.ui.core.MessageType (default: None)
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Element#constructor sap.ui.core.Element} can be used as well.

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.table.Table(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object

Templates.helpDescription:
Provides a comprehensive set of features for displaying and dealing with vast amounts of data. The Table control supports desktop PCs and tablet devices. On tablets, special consideration should be given to the number of visible columns and rows due to the limited performance of some devices.

In order to keep the document DOM as lean as possible, the Table control reuses its DOM elements of the rows. When the user scrolls, only the row contexts are changed but the rendered controls remain the same. This allows the Table control to handle huge amounts of data. Nevertheless, restrictions apply regarding the number of displayed columns. Keep the number as low as possible to improve performance. Due to the nature of tables, the used control for column templates also has a big influence on the performance.

The Table control relies completely on data binding, and its supported feature set is tightly coupled to the data model and binding being used.
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.Table
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new Table. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getWidth width} : sap.ui.core.CSSSize (default: auto)
    • {@link #getRowHeight rowHeight} : int
    • {@link #getColumnHeaderHeight columnHeaderHeight} : int
    • {@link #getColumnHeaderVisible columnHeaderVisible} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getVisibleRowCount visibleRowCount} : int (default: 10)
    • {@link #getFirstVisibleRow firstVisibleRow} : int (default: 0)
    • {@link #getSelectionMode selectionMode} : sap.ui.table.SelectionMode (default: MultiToggle)
    • {@link #getSelectionBehavior selectionBehavior} : sap.ui.table.SelectionBehavior (default: RowSelector)
    • {@link #getSelectedIndex selectedIndex} : int (default: -1)
    • {@link #getEditable editable} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getNavigationMode navigationMode} : sap.ui.table.NavigationMode (default: Scrollbar)
    • {@link #getThreshold threshold} : int (default: 100)
    • {@link #getEnableColumnReordering enableColumnReordering} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getEnableGrouping enableGrouping} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getShowColumnVisibilityMenu showColumnVisibilityMenu} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getShowNoData showNoData} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getVisibleRowCountMode visibleRowCountMode} : sap.ui.table.VisibleRowCountMode (default: Fixed)
    • {@link #getMinAutoRowCount minAutoRowCount} : int (default: 5)
    • {@link #getFixedColumnCount fixedColumnCount} : int (default: 0)
    • {@link #getFixedRowCount fixedRowCount} : int (default: 0)
    • {@link #getFixedBottomRowCount fixedBottomRowCount} : int (default: 0)
    • {@link #getEnableColumnFreeze enableColumnFreeze} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getEnableCellFilter enableCellFilter} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getShowOverlay showOverlay} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getEnableSelectAll enableSelectAll} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getEnableCustomFilter enableCustomFilter} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getEnableBusyIndicator enableBusyIndicator} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getRowActionCount rowActionCount} : int (default: 0)
    • {@link #getAlternateRowColors alternateRowColors} : boolean (default: false)
  • Aggregations
    • {@link #getTitle title} : sap.ui.core.Control|string
    • {@link #getFooter footer} : sap.ui.core.Control|string
    • {@link #getToolbar toolbar} : sap.ui.core.Toolbar
    • {@link #getExtension extension} : sap.ui.core.Control[]
    • {@link #getColumns columns} : sap.ui.table.Column[] (default)
    • {@link #getRows rows} : sap.ui.table.Row[]
    • {@link #getNoData noData} : sap.ui.core.Control|string
    • {@link #getRowActionTemplate rowActionTemplate} : sap.ui.table.RowAction
    • {@link #getRowSettingsTemplate rowSettingsTemplate} : sap.ui.table.RowSettings
    • {@link #getDragDropConfig dragDropConfig} : sap.ui.core.dnd.DragDropBase[]
    • {@link #getContextMenu contextMenu} : sap.ui.core.IContextMenu
  • Associations
    • {@link #getGroupBy groupBy} : (sap.ui.core.ID | sap.ui.table.Column)
    • {@link #getAriaLabelledBy ariaLabelledBy} : (sap.ui.core.ID | sap.ui.core.Control)[]
  • Events
    • {@link #event:rowSelectionChange rowSelectionChange} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:columnSelect columnSelect} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:columnResize columnResize} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:columnMove columnMove} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:sort sort} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:filter filter} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:group group} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:columnVisibility columnVisibility} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:cellClick cellClick} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:cellContextmenu cellContextmenu} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:beforeOpenContextMenu beforeOpenContextMenu} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:columnFreeze columnFreeze} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:customFilter customFilter} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:firstVisibleRowChanged firstVisibleRowChanged} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:busyStateChanged busyStateChanged} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Control#constructor sap.ui.core.Control} can be used as well.

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.table.TablePersoController(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		autoSave: ${bAutoSave}, // boolean
		persoService: ${persoService}, // any
		customDataKey: ${"persoKey"}, // string
		table: ${table} // (sap.ui.table.Table|string)
	}
)
Templates.helpDescription: The TablePersoController can be used to connect a table with a persistence service.
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.TablePersoController
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new TablePersoController. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getAutoSave autoSave} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getPersoService persoService} : any
    • {@link #getCustomDataKey customDataKey} : string (default: persoKey)
  • Associations
    • {@link #getTable table} : (sap.ui.core.ID | sap.ui.table.Table)
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor sap.ui.base.ManagedObject} can be used as well.

Templates.helpDescription: The TreeTable control provides a comprehensive set of features to display hierarchical data.
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.TreeTable
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new TreeTable. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getExpandFirstLevel expandFirstLevel} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getUseGroupMode useGroupMode} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getGroupHeaderProperty groupHeaderProperty} : string
    • {@link #getCollapseRecursive collapseRecursive} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getRootLevel rootLevel} : int (default: 0)
  • Events
    • {@link #event:toggleOpenState toggleOpenState} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.table.Table#constructor sap.ui.table.Table} can be used as well.

Templates.helpDescription: Fires event {@link #event:toggleOpenState toggleOpenState} to attached listeners.
Templates.name: sap.ui.table.TreeTable.fireToggleOpenState
